title: But For The Light
description: While struggling with her own mental health, Phoenix Agent, Porsha Fairchild is determined to rescue lost and abused children from back alleys, abandoned warehouses, and the streets of New York City. But when she finds that more and more of them are turning up dead, it is clear to her and the organization she works for, the SBI, that something more sinister is awry.
author: SD Logan
